    • Class Leaderboard

      • Serialized Fields

          Color cursorColour

          A 2D array to store the database information.

          The x-coordinate of the mouse cursor.

          The y-coordinate of the mouse cursor.

          A timer for constant repainting.

    • Class LevelTwo

      class LevelTwo extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • correctImage
          BufferedImage correctImage
          Image variable that shows up when you get an email correct
        • currentEmail
          int currentEmail
          Image variable representing the current image.
        • currentImage
          BufferedImage currentImage
          Image variables that changes, represents the current image
        • cursorColour
          Color cursorColour
          Custom cursor colour.
        • emails
          BufferedImage[][] emails
          Every single email image is in [][0] and the wrong screen is in [][1]
        • endScreen
          BufferedImage endScreen
          Image variable the represents the end screen.
        • errorLength
          BufferedImage errorLength
          Error image
        • errorLengthHelper
          boolean errorLengthHelper
          Boolean true if there is an error length with input for name
        • errorSpace
          BufferedImage errorSpace
          Error image
        • errorSpaceHelper
          boolean errorSpaceHelper
          Boolean true if there is a space in input for name
        • mouseX
          int mouseX
          The x-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        • mouseY
          int mouseY
          The y-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        • points
          int points
          The amount of points the user has
        • safeNotSafe
          boolean[] safeNotSafe
          Every single email in order, boolean represents true = safe, false = dangerous
        • saveName
          String saveName
          User inputs save name
        • saveScoreImage
          BufferedImage saveScoreImage
          Image variable representing save score
        • slide
          int slide
          Integer that represents what slide/segment that the user is on.
        • startScreen
          BufferedImage startScreen
          Image variable that holds the start screen
        • startTime
          int startTime
          Integer that represents timer for the email game.
        • timer
          Timer timer
          Variable that constantly calls repaint, essentially a constant controller of frames.
        • timingVariable
          int timingVariable
          Ensure scripted events are timed properly
        • work
          boolean work
          Constantly repaint until userinput (at the very end).

    • Class SplashScreen

      class SplashScreen extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • characters
          char[][] characters
          Matrix grid of characters
        • coverer
          int coverer
          Y coordinate for a rectangle box that covers the matrix (transition effect)
        • lastScreen
          BufferedImage lastScreen
          Last image for the splash screen
        • possibleCharacters
          String possibleCharacters
          Possible characters
        • splashScreenBackground
          BufferedImage splashScreenBackground
          Background image of the splash screen
        • splashScreenForeground
          BufferedImage splashScreenForeground
          Foreground image of the splash screen
        • splashScreenLogo
          BufferedImage splashScreenLogo
          Logo image for the splash screen
        • splashScreenVignetteOverlay
          BufferedImage splashScreenVignetteOverlay
          Overlay image to enhance appearance
        • timer
          Timer timer
          Timer to create delay for the animation
        • yPositions
          int[] yPositions
          Y positions for each column of characters
